text: Jasale imana lya'e, ra asala karma gare uniharula'i allahale nihsandeha yasto bagaincaharuma pravesa gara'une cha jasamuni naharaharu bagirahechan. Ra ti manisaharu jasale inkara gare uniharule duniyako nai pha'ida utha'irahechan. Ra pasu jastai kha'irahanchan ra uniharuko asali basasthana narka ho
